activities.name: Model UN Secretary-General
activities.impact: Increased participation by 40%, established scholarship fund

activities.name: Immigration Legal Aid
activities.description: Provided Spanish translation for legal consultations
activities.impact: Assisted 50+ families with asylum and citizenship applications

core_values.description: Fighting for equality and human rights

defining_moments.title: Family Immigration Struggle
defining_moments.description: Helping parents navigate complex immigration system
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Deep understanding of systemic barriers and injustice

defining_moments.title: Bridging Cultures Through Translation
defining_moments.description: As a volunteer translator for Immigration Legal Aid, I helped families navigate the complex legal system. This experience taught me the power of language in bridging cultural divides and advocating for justice.

defining_moments.title: Model UN: From Delegate to Leader
defining_moments.description: As Secretary-General of Model UN, I organized international conferences, increasing participation by 40%. This role honed my leadership skills and deepened my understanding of global diplomacy.

defining_moments.title: Family's Immigration Journey
defining_moments.description: Helping my parents navigate the immigration system revealed systemic barriers and fueled my passion for advocacy. This personal journey instilled a deep sense of justice and empathy in me.
